Going forward, Eric Schmidt will still have an influential role in the company in terms of continuing relationships in political circles and other external issues says Google. We do not view Eric Schmidt 's new role as executive chairman and Larry Page 's new role as chief executive as negative developments. In our view, Eric Schmidt very effectively spearheaded Google to become one of the largest and most innovative technology companies of our times and we expect Larry Page to be an equally effective CEO of Google, wrote Sandeep Aggarwal , Internet analyst at Caris& Company.
